channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Maui’s new temporary homes show what better disaster housing can look like

item.title: A Simple Shape Turned the Coca-Cola Logo Into a Timeless Icon
item.description: It all ties back to one design tweak from 1969.

item.title: The greatest Starbucks in the world is in Real Madrid’s soccer stadium
item.description: I don’t care about Starbucks. Madrid now drowns in indie coffee shops with coffee brewed from specialty beans that are flown in by winged unicorns and...

item.title: Why Economic Data Keeps Pushing the Stock Market to Record Highs
item.description: Inflation and jobs numbers have combined to form a bullish cocktail.

item.title: Microdramas are TikTok turned up to 11, and they’re coming for your time and money

item.title: Spend Smarter, Scale Smarter: 7 Ways to Elevate the Unsung Heroes of Growth
item.description: Why it’s time to celebrate the savers, not just the sellers.

item.title: Why This AI Startup Thinks It Can Compete With Nvidia
item.description: Positron is betting on cost-efficient AI hardware in a bid to take on Nvidia, the industry behemoth.

item.title: Opendoor’s ‘founder mode’ and new CEO bet

item.title: Millennials are moving into the C-suite—but are they ready?

item.title: The ‘Godfather of Financial Independence’ says young people should do two things to build wealth—and it’s not buying a house, which is ‘silly’
item.description: "That's what I tell my daughter, and that's what she's doing," JL Collins said, adding her sound decision-making has given her "f--k you money."
